# Mohammad Raouf Abedini - Cybersecurity & Software Engineering Portfolio

## Identity
Name: Mohammad Raouf Abedini (Raouf)
Role: Cybersecurity Specialist, Software Engineer
Location: Sydney, Australia
Focus: Privacy-first security tools, eBPF, Rust, Go, Next.js.

## Core Competencies (Keywords)
- Offensive Security: Penetration Testing, Red Teaming, Threat Modelling.
- Defensive Security: eBPF Runtime Security, Network Forensics, Privacy Engineering.
- Engineering: Next.js, React, TypeScript, Rust, Systems Programming.

## Featured Projects (The "Truth" for Retrieval)
1. Mehr Guard: A privacy-first mobile security app for Android/iOS. Features real-time threat detection without cloud dependency.
2. GitSwitch: AI-powered Git client for managing multiple identities and generating semantic commits.
3. ECRSM: Educational Cloud Runtime Security Monitor using eBPF, Go, and React.

## Philosophy
Raouf operates at the intersection of "Build" (Scalable Architecture) and "Secure" (Defensive Design). He advocates for privacy-by-design and local-first processing.

Website: https://raouf.sh
